itemDescription: shipping magnate and Conservative Party politician (1855-1934)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir James Knott, 1st Baronet (31 January 1855 – 8 June 1934) was a shipping magnate and Conservative Party politician in northeast England.

response: * Sir James Knott, 1st Baronet (1852–1934), English shipping magnate and politician
